name: Ryuuki Heidan Danzarb
overview: A sci-fi RPG developed by Pandora Box (with additional input from anime giant Gainax) and published by Yutaka for the Super Famicom in Japan only, but it did receive a English fan translation from Aeon Genesis. The game is mission-based, and each mission has different directives. This also means that the player will be expected to perform different activities to successfully conclude the mission. The game's turn-based combat is depicted similarly to Phantasy Star and Dragon Quest: large enemy icons with the player's party's stats displayed underneath.
